name: SillySnake.io (V 1.0.1)
description:
Your garden is full of large snakes that are wandering to eat your silly snake.

Help your silly snake eat and grow as long as possible before it is completely eaten by the other large snakes.

Note: This is a alpha V 1.0.1

We will be adding:

- Multiplayer

- Achievements & leaderboard

- Gamepad support

- More games and worlds to unlock.

HaveFunBeingSilly
